name: cto-coach
description: AI-powered coaching platform for engineering leadership

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:db"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.db:setup: docker-compose up -d postgres && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
